name: Shadow Structural Observer
function: Provides isolated, read-only access to Shadow Structural Metrics (Cambridge Analytica-derived metrics: SEI, CLIP, NOR, PTS, SCG, FVC) with strict no-influence guarantees and SEED provenance tracking
inputs: symbol_pool: List of symbolic events to analyze
time_window_hours: Time window for temporal metrics (default: 24)
metrics_requested: List of metric IDs to compute (default: all six)
outputs: ssm_bundle: Shadow Structural Metrics bundle with provenance
isolation_proof: Cryptographic proof of non-influence guarantee
constraints: Provenance chain included for all metrics
No influence on other system metrics (guaranteed)
canonical_statement: ϟ₇ (SSO) enables observation of psychological manipulation vectors (SEI/CLIP/NOR/PTS/SCG/FVC) without allowing those observations to influence system decisions. It enforces strict isolation through ABX-Runes coupling, maintains SEED-compliant provenance for all computations, and provides cryptographic proof that computed metrics remain in shadow mode with zero influence on other system components.
